kDesc
Hanging scroll with "The Ends Justify the Means" written in forceful calligraphy.[#Legal]
Parchemin suspendu avec "La fin justifie les moyens" écrit d'un trait énergique.[#Legal]
Hängende Papierrolle, auf der "Der Zweck heiligt die Mittel" mit kräftigen Pinselstrichen geschrieben steht.[#Legal]
Rotolo con la frase "Il fine giustifica i mezzi" scritta con pennellate energiche.[#Legal]
Pergamino colgante con el texto "El fin justifica los medios" escrito con una caligrafía poderosa.[#Legal]
筆文字で力強く「臥薪嘗胆」と書かれた掛け軸。[#Legal]
붓글씨로 힘 있게 「와신상담」이라고 쓰여진 족자. [#Legal]
Japanese wall scroll in which "Gasinsyoutan" (Enduring hardships to accomplish goals) is written on it with force by ink brush.[#Legal]
以毛筆渾勁寫上「臥薪嘗膽」字樣的掛軸。[#Legal]
以毛筆渾勁寫上「臥薪嘗膽」字樣的掛軸。[#Legal]
Hanging scroll with "The Ends Justify the Means" written in forceful calligraphy.[#Legal]
